    ğŸ› ï¸ Project of the Day: â€œSystem Health Dashboard Scriptâ€

    Scenario:
    The sysadmin team wants a CLI dashboard showing real-time system health and alerts for anomalies. Steps:

    1. Script collects:
    • CPU, RAM, disk usage, active users, failed SSH logins
      1. Flags results outside safe thresholds
      2. Generates /var/log/sys-health.log with timestamp
      3. Bonus: add color output or ASCII art title for flair Deliverables:
  • Markdown: project-system-health-dashboard.md
  • Script: sys_health.sh
  • Screenshot: Sample dashboard output
